code: import React,{Fragment}from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{deleteEducation}from'../../actions/profile';import formatDate from'../../utils/formatDate';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Education=_ref=>{let{education,deleteEducation}=_ref;const educations=education.map(edu=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:edu.school}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"hide-sm",children:edu.degree}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[formatDate(edu.from)," - ",edu.to?formatDate(edu.to):'Now']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteEducation(edu._id),className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete"})})]},edu._id));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"my-2",children:"Education Credentials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"School"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"hide-sm",children:"Degree"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"hide-sm",children:"Years"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:educations})]})]});};export default connect(null,{deleteEducation})(Education);
